entities: Committee established pursuant to paragraph 3 (a) of resolution 1591 (2005)
reporting_cycle: The Panel of Experts to provide a midterm briefing no later than 31 July 2012, and a final report no later than 30 days prior to termination of its mandate
summary:
6. Requests monthly updates from the Panel on its activities.

7. Requests a report on the implementation and effectiveness of paragraph 10 of resolution 1945 (2010).

8. Requests the Panel to coordinate with UNAMID and assess progress towards reducing violations.

9. Regrets continued violence and intends to impose targeted sanctions on individuals and entities meeting listing criteria.

10. Requests investigation into attacks on UNAMID personnel.

11. Expresses concern about items being converted for military purposes and transferred to Darfur.

12. Urges States to cooperate with the Committee and Panel of Experts.

13. Urges States to report on actions taken to implement measures.

14. Expresses concern about non-compliance with travel ban and asset freeze.

15. Intends to review implementation of measures.

16. Reaffirms the Committee's mandate to encourage dialogue.

17. Welcomes the Committee's work on private sector actors.

18. Decides to remain seized of the matter.
